import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import {ShopContext} from '../context/ShopContext'; import { assets } from '../assets/assets'; import Title from '../component/Title'; const Collection = () => { const {product} =useContext(ShopContext); const [showFilter, setshowFilter]=useState(false); return (
{/* Filter options */}
{/* !showfilter is used because when the filter is true it will make it false vice versa */}

setshowFilter(!showFilter)} className=' my-2 text-xl flex items-center cursor-pointer gap-2'>FILTERS

{/* Category filter */}

CATEGORY

Men

Women

Kids

{/* Sub category filter */}

TYPE

Top wear

Bottom wear

Winter wear

{/* Right side */}
</div> </div> </div> ) } export default Collection
